text: Bravo is an American basic cable television network. It was launched on December 8, 1980. It is owned by the NBCUniversal Media Group division of Comcast's NBCUniversal. The channel originally focused on programming related to fine arts and film. The network now focuses on reality series targeted at 25-to-54-year-old women and the LGBTQIA+ community at large. In January 1995, a Canadian television channel of the same name (also known as CTV Drama Channel) was launched. Category:American television channels Category:NBCUniversal Category:1980 establishments in the United States
title: Bravo (American TV network)
